channel.title: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?
channel.description:
if i have a item such as a orb that has the options on it "teleport""use""drop". how can i make the item teleport me to a certain area on a deltabase server.
please tell me the place to put it (name of file) and some what of a example code?

item.title: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?
item.dc:creator: @Pheega Pheega
item.description:
@Pheega wrote:

[quote=“ACCOUNT FAILED, post:7, topic:281703”]People with no real Java knowledge have just seen the word ‘packet’ tossed around in the last few months that they don’t know what it really is.[/quote]WHAT DOES IT REALLY MEAN?
[/quote]A “packet” is a piece of data. or a message, sent across a network.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?

item.title: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?
item.dc:creator: @ACCOUNT_FAILED ACCOUNT FAILED
item.description:
@ACCOUNT_FAILED wrote:

People with no real Java knowledge have just seen the word ‘packet’ tossed around in the last few months that they don’t know what it really is.
[/quote]WHAT DOES IT REALLY MEAN?

item.source: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?

item.title: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?
item.dc:creator: @Pheega Pheega
item.description:
@Pheega wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:3, topic:281703"][quote author=Pheega link=topic=372153.msg2809414#msg2809414 date=1243901719]
You’ll want to find your item click packet (aka “case”) and add something like this to it:

teleportToX = 1234;
teleportToY = 1234;

Of course you’d want to change the “1234” values to wherever you want the player to be teleported.
Unfortunately I’m not too familiar with the Delta source, so I can’t tell you exactly where to put this code.
Maybe someone else here can point you in the proper direction of where to add it.
[/quote]

A packet is not a “case”, it’s only listed as a “case” because the packets are used in a switch statement.[/quote]
That’s why I put the word “case” in quotes - so he would understand what I mean, without me making a fool of myself. I realize that the “case” is a part of the packetType switch statement, which is called inside the parseIncomingPackets() method for every game packet (opcode, size, payload[size]) received on every (sometimes, in the case of scattering, among two) read call(s).

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a item teleport me when i click on it?
